name: Reject False Idols
description:
Reject False Idols is all about destroying false idols and his followers with energy blasts and talking to GOD! Enter the temple, destroy everything, repeat! It's heavily inspired by Vlambeer's Karate and the music Thou Shalt Always Kill, by dan le sac vs Scroobius Pip.

Reject False Idols is part of the wabi-sabi games, a collection of one week games made with love. You can support the project via Patreon here: http://www.patreon.com/loudnoisesgames

FEATURES

- Beautiful Atari age graphics!

- Atari age simple controls. Two buttons and one joystick!

- Destroy all the headless followers!

- Destroy all the false idols statues!

CREDITS

Andre Asai - Art, Programming, additional Game Design

Thiago Adamo - Sound Design, Music
